Scene:
The Pawnshop
(Shichimise / 質店)

Play: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (染模様妹背門松)

Production: October 1971

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Tsudayū IV (竹本津大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Kanji VI (鶴澤寛治 (六))
